Demo

Taylor then Ben

int frames = 17;
  byte anim[frames][8]={{B00000000,B01100110,B01100110,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B01111110,B01000010},\
                        {B00000000,B01100110,B01100110,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B01111110,B10000001},\
                        {B00000000,B01100110,B01100110,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B11111111,B00000000},\
